examples.example: 生活中有好多美好的事物等待我们去发现。

translate.english: There are many wonderful things in life waiting for us to discover.

examples.example: 天空中有好多漂亮的风筝在自由自在地飞翔。

translate.english: There are many beautiful kites flying freely in the sky.

examples.example: 这个世界上有好多有趣的地方值得我们去探索。

translate.english: There are many interesting places in this world worth exploring.
